scripts.canaryrelease: npm run build && release pre --show-url && npm run registry-publish-canary
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && release patch --show-url && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && release minor --show-url && npm run registry-publish
scripts.release:major: npm run build && release major --show-url && npm run registry-publish
scripts.registry-publish: npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter registry-publish && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid registry-publish && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid registry-publish
scripts.registry-publish-canary: npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter registry-publish-canary && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-react-aggrid registry-publish-canary && npm run --prefix packages/adaptableblotter-ng-aggrid registry-publish-canary
scripts.build: npm run build-core && npm run build-react && npm run build-angular
scripts.tsc: npm run tsc-core && npm run tsc-react && npm run tsc-angular
